title: Democrats Must Raise the Debt Themselves
sub_head: The GOP won’t play ball, and a $2 trillion coin gimmick isn’t a responsible solution.
body:
On Monday Mitch McConnell sent President Biden a letter insisting, as he has for months, that Democrats bear sole responsibility for raising the nation’s debt limit. The president responded by calling Mr. McConnell’s position “reckless” and “irresponsible.”
Although Mr. McConnell’s tactics are patently partisan, Mr. Biden and Chuck Schumer must face facts: They do not have the power to make him change course. If Democrats don’t discharge the responsibility Mr. McConnell has thrust upon them, the country faces an economic crisis.
